pageTitle: Suggestions and Complaints - Embassy of the State of Palestine
heroSubtitle: Please fill out the form below to send your suggestions or complaints.

formHeader.title: Suggestions and Complaints Form
formHeader.description: We value your opinions and suggestions. You can send your suggestions or complaints through the form below and we will contact you as soon as possible.

formAlternative.title: Or open the form in a separate window
formAlternative.description: If the form does not display correctly, you can open it in a new window

points.notification: An instant notification will be sent to email upon receiving your message
points.response: We will respond to you within 24-48 business hours
